text.name: To Me!
text.desc: [WhenUse] Next turn, the leftmost Skill Slot of 1 other ally with the highest Max HP gains +(highest Reson.) [Aggro] (Once per turn)

text.name: To Me!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Next turn, the leftmost Skill Slot of 1 other ally with the highest Max HP gains +(highest Reson.) [Aggro] (Once per turn)
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 1 [Protection] to the ally next turn when they gain [Aggro] (Once per turn)

text.name: To Me!
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 2 [DefenseUp] to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
[WhenUse] Next turn, the leftmost Skill Slot of 1 other ally with the highest Max HP gains +(highest Reson.) [Aggro] (Once per turn)
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 1 [Protection] to the ally next turn when they gain [Aggro] (Once per turn)

text.name: Pursue Them to the End!
text.desc: [WhenUse] Every Reson. of the highest Reson. adds 10% chance that this unit orders the ally on its immediate right(on the Dashboard) to use [CoverAttack] this turn.

text.name: Pursue Them to the End!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Every Reson. of the highest Reson. adds 15% chance that this unit orders the ally on its immediate right(on the Dashboard) to use [CoverAttack] this turn.
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 1 [AttackDmgUp] to the ally
- At 4+ Pride A-Reson., apply 1 additional Pride Power Up

text.name: Pursue Them to the End!
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 3 [AttackUp] to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
[WhenUse] Every Reson. of the highest Reson. adds 20% chance that this unit orders the ally on its immediate right(on the Dashboard) to use [CoverAttack] this turn.
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to the ally
- At 4+ Pride A-Reson., apply 2 additional Pride Power Up

text.name: Harpoon of Obsession
text.desc:
Deal more damage based on target's missing HP (+0.2% damage per 1% missing HP, max +20%)
[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, (1+(highest A-Reson./2)) allies with the least SP heal 10 SP, gain 2 [Breath], and +4 [Breath] Count. (2 times max. Max # of allies that can be healed: 4)

text.name: Harpoon of Obsession
text.desc:
Deal more damage based on target's missing HP (+0.3% damage per 1% missing HP, max +30%)
Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on target (Max 2)
[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, (1+(highest A-Reson./2)) allies with the least SP heal 10 SP, gain 2 [Breath], and gain +4 [Breath] Count. (4 times max. Max # of allies that can be healed: 4)

text.name: Do Not Fear
text.desc: [WhenUse] Heal 3 SP for 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard (2 times max)

text.name: Do Not Fear
text.desc: [WhenUse] Heal 5 SP for 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard (2 times max)

1080801.name: Captain of the Pequod
1080801.desc:
After Attack: if the enemy is defeated after this unit's attack,
- gain [HeatedGasHarpoon] next turn.
- 1 other ally with the least SP heals 7 SP.
- If the ally is from The Pequod, heal an additional 5 SP.

1080802.name: Hour of the Hunt
1080802.desc: If the target is a <Lake Entity>, deal +10% damage

1080811.name: Captain of the Pequod
1080811.desc:
- After Attack: if the enemy is defeated after this unit's attack,
- gain 4 [Breath], +2 [Breath] Count. Then, gain [OverHeatedGasHarpoon] next turn.
- 2 other allies with the least SP heal 7 SP and gain 4 [Breath].
- If the allies are from The Pequod, heal an additional 5 SP. Then, once per turn, apply 1 Pierce Power Up next turn.

1080821.name: Captain's Orders
1080821.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP gains 2 [Breath] when the target is defeated after that unit's attack (2 times per turn)

1080831.name: Captain's Orders
1080831.desc: After Attack: 1 ally with the highest SP gains 2 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count when the target is defeated after that unit's attack (2 times per turn)

main: Loses SP when allies kill an enemy of a higher level.
S1 and S2 give defensive and offensive buffs respectively to the allies adjacent to her in the dashboard. Stronger buffs applied at 4+ A-Reson.

S2 has a 20% chance per Reson (100% at 5-Res) to trigger {status:CoverAttack} on the ally that comes immediately after her on the dashboard, giving them a free S1 on the same target after {sinner:8} attacks.
S3 heals SP for allies and gives them {status:Breath} if it kills its target. The number of allies affected increases with A-Reson.
Defense heals SP for her allies adjacent on the dashboard.
other: If her passive is active, kills will give her {status:Breath} and give allies {status:Breath} and SP healing. Pequod identities heal more SP and get {status:PenetrateResultUp}. She also gains {status:OverHeatedGasHarpoon} for a turn, inflicting additional {status:Combustion} on Hit. Kills with her S3 still provide its regular bonuses on top of these.
